features: 【Durable & Adjustable】 The Hair Dryer Holder is made of high-quality materials for long-lasting use. Its height can be adjusted to fit different sizes of hair dryers, making it versatile and practical.

【Organize & Save Space】 This 3-in-1 Blow Dryer Holder serves as a hair tool organizer, providing a neat and tidy storage solution for your hair dryers, flat irons, curling irons, and hair straighteners. It helps you save valuable counter space and keep your bathroom or dressing area clutter-free.

【Heat-resistant Design】The Hair Dryer Holder is designed with heat-resistant materials, ensuring that your hair tools are safely stored even when they are still hot. The durable construction can withstand high temperatures, providing peace of mind and preventing any accidents.

【Versatile & Practical】This Adjustable Height Hair Dryer Holder is suitable for use in bathrooms, dressing rooms, and even salons. It can accommodate different shapes and sizes of hair tools, making it a versatile organizer for any hair styling needs.

【Easy Installation】The Hair Tool Organizer can be easily mounted on the wall or cabinet door using the included screws. It is designed to securely hold your hair tools without taking up too much space. Installation is quick and hassle-free.

【Packaging includes】1×Hair Dryer Holder, 2×Hanging Hooks, 3×Screws and Expansion Bolts, 1×user manual, ultra thin hook with EVA foam padded to fit your cabinet door and protect the cabinet from scratches.
body.description: Introduction: This hair tool organizer is designed with adjustable height, allowing you to customize it to your specific needs. Made from high-quality materials, this hair dryer holder is built to last. The sturdy construction ensures that it can easily support the weight of your hair dryers, flat irons, curling irons, and hair straighteners. It can be easily mounted on your bathroom wall or cabinet door, saving you valuable countertop space. Features: One of the key features of this hair tool organizer is its adjustable height. Whether you have a small bathroom or a larger one, this holder can be adjusted to the perfect height, ensuring that your hair tools are easily accessible. No more bending down or searching through cluttered drawers! Another great feature of this hair dryer holder is its versatility. It can hold not just your hair dryer, but also other hair tools like flat irons, curling irons, and hair straighteners. The holder has specially designed compartments to accommodate different types and sizes of hair tools, keeping them neatly organized and within reach. Not only does this hair tool organizer provide functionality, but it also adds a touch of elegance to your bathroom decor. The sleek and modern design blends seamlessly with any style, making it a perfect addition to your bathroom. The compact size of the holder ensures that it doesn't take up too much space, while still providing ample storage for your hair tools. With the Hair Dryer Holder, you can say goodbye to messy countertops and tangled cords. Keep your bathroom tidy and organized with this versatile and stylish hair tool organizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effortless hair tool organizer
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my bathroom organization with the YIGII Hair Tool Organizer, specifically the grey blow dryer holder, and I'm thrilled to share my experience with this sleek and practical storage solution.Design and Aesthetics (5/5):The YIGII Hair Tool Organizer not only serves its functional purpose but also adds a touch of modern elegance to my bathroom. The grey color is sophisticated, seamlessly blending with my decor. The thoughtful design accommodates hair tools of various sizes, ensuring a clutter-free and visually appealing space.Installation and Stability (4.5/5):Installing the organizer was a breeze. The wall-mounted design is space-efficient, keeping my countertop clear. The included mounting hardware and clear instructions made the process straightforward. The organizer is securely attached to the side of the bathroom cabinet, providing stability even with the weight of multiple hair tools.Versatility and Tool Compatibility (5/5):I appreciate the versatility of the YIGII Hair Tool Organizer. The designated slots for the blow dryer, straightener, and other hair tools are well-sized, accommodating different brands and sizes. It's a one-stop solution for keeping all my hair tools easily accessible and neatly organized.Durability and Quality (5/5):Crafted with high-quality materials, the organizer feels robust and durable. The holder for the blow dryer is sturdy, ensuring a secure fit. I appreciate the attention to detail in the construction, which speaks to the overall quality of the product.Space Efficiency (5/5):One of the standout features is the efficient use of space. The wall-mounted design maximizes vertical space, making it perfect for bathrooms with limited countertop real estate. It not only keeps my hair tools organized but also frees up valuable surface space.Accessibility and Convenience (4.8/5):Having my hair tools within arm's reach has streamlined my morning routine. The open design allows for easy access, and the thoughtful placement of each tool ensures a clutter-free look.Overall Satisfaction (4.9/5):The YIGII Hair Tool Organizer has proven to be a stylish and efficient addition to my bathroom. Its thoughtful design, durable construction, and space-saving features make it a standout choice for anyone looking to declutter their space while maintaining a chic aesthetic.In conclusion, if you're in search of an effective and visually pleasing solution to organize your hair tools, the YIGII Hair Tool Organizer in grey is a fantastic investment. It not only meets but exceeds expectations in terms of functionality and design. Say goodbye to tangled cords and hello to a tidy, well-organized bathroom space!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds all my shtuff
reviews.reviewText: Listen I got too excited about this product that I had to redo my review. Basically my stuff had been taking up my bathroom space so I purchased this as well as this cute little shelf thingy and I wasn’t sure if it was enough to hold all my hair care shtuff but I stand corrected. It holds my hair dryer, curling want, straightener and beach waver as well as other miscellaneous items. It doesn’t take up a lot of cabinet space and fits perfectly. It’s sturdy and easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, but...
reviews.reviewText: Good quality metal basket, but difficult to attach inside bathroom cabinet door. The hooks to hang it on the door are too short, so the hair tools prevent the door from closing. I had to attach wires to hang the basket lower, then it slides side-to-side, so I had to attach the stick-on hooks that are meant for wall hanging. I would not recommend this item unless you have room for it to just sit on the counter.
